Name: Gwilym
If you would, why?: Their soaps make me feel radiant

Name: Alice
If you wouldn't, why?: The customer service is terrible, I licked one soap to see if it was 'banana' as advertised, and I got kicked out

Name: Angelos
If you would, why?: Their products are 100% natural (pure olive oil soap lover)

Name: Angelos
If you would, why?: I found out the olives we're from Greece

Name: Anya
If you would, why?: I love that you have soaps smelling like ginger beer

Name: Andre
If you would, why?: great for my slip and slide

Name: Bert
If you would, why?: Cleans perfectly and isn't too slippery

Name: Lady MacBeth
If you wouldn't, why?: Out, damned spot! out, I say! Will these hands ne'er be clean? Here's the smell of the blood still: all the perfumes of Chin Beard and Suds Co will not sweeten this little hand.

Name: Sylvie
If you would, why?: Wonderfully fragranced soaps. They always delight my guests. Such a pity that you discontinued my favourite smell though!

Name: James Cagney
If you would, why?: My dirty stinkin rat is now nice and clean

Name: Joe
If you wouldn't, why?: Smells great but I can't get it out of my hair!!!
